name: cs340_pm
description: Every time when you try to make a change, you need to generate & change your branch as follows. ```shell 	$ git clone <..the address..> 	$ git branch // check the current branch(es) 		* master 	$ git branch sub1  // generate a branch "sub1"(random name) 	$ git checkout sub1 // move to sub1 branch 	$ git branch // check again 		master 		* sub1 // * means the current branch
